TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ParallelLoopState extends System.Object

summary.span: 讓平行迴圈的反覆項目與其他反覆項目互動。

span.span: Enables iterations of parallel loops to interact with other iterations.

summary.span: 類別會在每個迴圈中提供這個類別的執行個體，您不能在自己的程式碼中建立執行個體。

span.span: An instance of this class is provided by the class to each loop; you can not create instances in your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意，您無法具現化這個類別的執行個體。Note that you cannot instantiate an instance of this class. 它自動產生，編譯器為呼叫的引數或方法。It is automatically generated by the compiler as an argument in a call to the or method. 這個範例將提供說明。The example provides an illustration. 這類建構`for`並`foreach`（在 C# 中) 及`For`和`For Each`（在 Visual Basic) 循序執行從最低到最高的索引，或從集合中的第一個物件的最後一個。Constructs such as `for` and `foreach` (in C#) and `For` and `For Each` (in Visual Basic) execute sequentially from the lowest index to the highest or from the first object in a set to the last. 相反地，和方法則否。In contrast, the and methods do not. 因為以平行方式執行迴圈的個別反覆項目，可以開始與結束依任何順序。Because individual iterations of the loop run in parallel, they can begin and end in any order. 類別可讓平行迴圈與彼此互動的個別反覆項目。The class allows individual iterations of parallel loops to interact with one another. 類別可讓您：The class allows you to: - 結束目前的反覆項目，並防止啟動藉由呼叫任何其他反覆項目方法。Exit the current iteration and prevent any additional iterations from starting by calling the method. 這不會影響已經開始執行的反覆項目。This does not affect iterations that have already begun execution. - 藉由呼叫執行時，防止任何反覆項目索引大於目前的索引與方法。Prevent any iterations with an index greater than the current index from executing by calling the method. 這不會影響已經開始執行的反覆項目。This does not affect iterations that have already begun execution. - 判斷是否發生例外狀況發生的任何迴圈反覆項目中所擷取的值屬性。Determine whether an exception has occurred in any loop iteration by retrieving the value of the property. - 判斷是否有呼叫任何反覆項目迴圈方法所擷取的值屬性。Determine whether any iteration of the loop has called the method by retrieving the value of the property. 您可以使用這個屬性從 開始之前，於迴圈的反覆項目傳回方法，但仍在執行。You can use this property to return from iterations of the loop that started before the call to the method but are still executing. - 判斷是否已呼叫迴圈的任何反覆項目或是方法，或藉由擷取的值來擲回例外狀況屬性。Determine whether any iteration of the loop has called the or method or has thrown an exception by retrieving the value of the property. - 從其索引大於反覆項目所擷取的值已呼叫 Break 索引長時間執行反覆項目結束屬性。Exit from a long-running iteration whose index is greater than the index of an iteration in which Break was called by retrieving the value of the property. ## Examples 下列範例會以平行方式執行迴圈的最多 100 個反覆項目。The following example executes up to 100 iterations of a loop in parallel. 從 1 到 1000 毫秒之間的隨機間隔就會暫停每個反覆項目。Each iteration pauses for a random interval from 1 to 1,000 milliseconds. 隨機產生的值會決定迴圈的反覆項目上呼叫方法。A randomly generated value determines on which iteration of the loop the method is called. 如輸出所範例所示，其索引大於任何反覆項目呼叫後面的屬性值開始方法。As the output from the example shows, no iterations whose index is greater than the property value start after the call to the method. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/cs/break1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/vb/break1.vb#2)] 因為迴圈的反覆項目仍可能同時執行的時機呼叫方法，每個反覆項目會呼叫屬性，以檢查是否已呼叫另一個反覆項目方法。Because iterations of the loop are still likely to be executing when the method is called, each iteration calls the property to check whether another iteration has called the method. 屬性值是否`true`，在反覆項目值檢查屬性以及其是否大於目前的反覆項目的索引值，會立即傳回。If the property value is `true`, the iteration checks the value of the property and, if it is greater than the current iteration's index value, returns immediately.

threadsafe.span: A執行個體適用於只在迴圈的執行個體所提供的主體內。

span.span: A instance is meant to be used only within the body of the loop to which an instance was provided.

threadsafe.span: 不是安全地使用所提供執行個體相關聯的迴圈後結束，也不安全明確它遞交給其他執行緒，並且有在任何時候存取這些執行緒。

span.span: It is not safe to use a provided instance after the associated loop ends, nor is it safe to explicitly hand it off to other threads and have those threads access it at any time.

threadsafe.span: 不同會提供在迴圈中所涉及的每個執行緒的執行個體。

span.span: A different instance will be provided to each thread involved in a loop.

related.span: 資料平行處理原則 (工作平行程式庫)

span.span: Data Parallelism (Task Parallel Library)

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Break() cil managed

summary.span: 傳達 迴圈應該在過了目前的反覆項目之後，依系統的方便盡早停止執行反覆項目。

span.span: Communicates that the loop should cease execution of iterations beyond the current iteration at the system's earliest convenience.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示沒有反覆項目目前的反覆項目之後，應該執行。 indicates that no iterations after the current iteration should be run. 實際上，它就會取消迴圈中的任何其他反覆項目。It effectively cancels any additional iterations of the loop. 不過，它不會停止已經開始執行任何反覆項目。However, it does not stop any iterations that have already begun execution. 例如，如果從平行迴圈，逐一查看從 0 到 1000，所有的反覆項目小於 100 應該仍然會執行，但的反覆項目從透過 101 到 1000，尚未啟動未執行的第 100 次反覆運算呼叫。For example, if is called from the 100th iteration of a parallel loop iterating from 0 to 1,000, all iterations less than 100 should still be run, but the iterations from 101 through to 1000 that have not yet started are not executed. 長時間執行反覆項目可能已經執行，如設定屬性目前的反覆項目的索引，如果目前的索引小於目前的值。For long-running iterations that may already be executing, sets the property to the current iteration's index if the current index is less than the current value of . 若要停止其索引大於最低中斷反覆項目，從競爭執行的反覆項目，您應該執行下列作業：To stop iterations whose index is greater than the lowest break iteration from competing execution, you should do the following: 1. 檢查是否屬性是`true`。Check whether the property is `true`. 2. 結束反覆項目是否大於其索引屬性值。Exit from the iteration if its index is greater than the property value. 這個範例將提供說明。The example provides an illustration. 通常會採用以搜尋為基礎的演算法，其中的順序是存在於資料來源。 is typically employed in search-based algorithms where an ordering is present in the data source. ## Examples 下列範例會以平行方式執行迴圈的最多 100 個反覆項目。The following example executes up to 100 iterations of a loop in parallel. 從 1 到 1000 毫秒之間的隨機間隔就會暫停每個反覆項目。Each iteration pauses for a random interval from 1 to 1,000 milliseconds. 隨機產生的值會決定迴圈的反覆項目上呼叫方法。A randomly generated value determines on which iteration of the loop the method is called. 如輸出所範例所示，其索引大於任何反覆項目呼叫後面的屬性值開始方法。As the output from the example shows, no iterations whose index is greater than the property value start after the call to the method. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/cs/break1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/vb/break1.vb#2)] 因為迴圈的反覆項目仍可能同時執行的時機呼叫方法，每個反覆項目會呼叫屬性，以檢查是否已呼叫另一個反覆項目方法。Because iterations of the loop are still likely to be executing when the method is called, each iteration calls the property to check whether another iteration has called the method. 屬性值是否`true`，在反覆項目值檢查屬性以及其是否大於目前的反覆項目的索引值，會立即傳回。If the property value is `true`, the iteration checks the value of the property and, if it is greater than the current iteration's index value, returns immediately.

span.span: The method was previously called.

exception.span: 和 可能無法由相同迴圈的反覆項目搭配使用。

span.span: and may not be used in combination by iterations of the same loop.

summary.span: 取得迴圈中是否有任何反覆項目已擲回該反覆項目未處理的例外狀況。

span.span: Gets whether any iteration of the loop has thrown an exception that went unhandled by that iteration.

value.span: 如果擲回未處理的例外狀況，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if an unhandled exception was thrown; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsStopped As Boolean
public: property bool IsStopped { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得迴圈中是否有任何反覆項目已呼叫 方法。

span.span: Gets whether any iteration of the loop has called the method.

value.span: 如果有任何反覆項目藉由呼叫 方法而停止迴圈，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if any iteration has stopped the loop by calling the method; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 長時間執行反覆項目的迴圈中，您可以擷取的值屬性來判斷是否迴圈的任何反覆項目，開始執行之前呼叫方法仍在執行。For long-running iterations of the loop, you can retrieve the value of the property to determine whether any iterations of the loop that began execution before the call to the method are still executing. 然後，您可以使用的值屬性來判斷是否應該立即傳回或正常執行。You can then use the value of the property to determine whether they should return immediately or execute normally. ## Examples 下列範例會以平行方式執行迴圈的最多 10,000 個反覆項目。The following example executes up to 10,000 iterations of a loop in parallel. 從 1 到 1000 毫秒之間的隨機間隔就會暫停每個反覆項目。Each iteration pauses for a random interval from 1 to 1,000 milliseconds. 隨機產生的值會決定迴圈的反覆項目上呼叫方法。A randomly generated value determines on which iteration of the loop the method is called. 因為迴圈的反覆項目仍可能同時執行的時機呼叫方法時，lambda 運算式呼叫方法來檢查是否已呼叫另一個反覆項目方法。Because iterations of the loop are still likely to be executing when the method is called, the lambda expression calls the method to check whether another iteration has called the method. 如果它傳回`true`，反覆項目會立即傳回。If it returns `true`, the iteration returns immediately. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/cs/stop1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/vb/stop1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LowestBreakIteration As Nullable(Of Long)
public: property Nullable<long> LowestBreakIteration { Nullable<long> get(); };

summary.span: 取得迴圈中呼叫 的最低反覆項目。

span.span: Gets the lowest iteration of the loop from which was called.

value.span: 呼叫 的最低反覆項目。

span.span: The lowest iteration from which was called.

value.span: 在 迴圈的案例中，值是根據內部產生的索引。

span.span: In the case of a loop, the value is based on an internally-generated index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 平行迴圈來呼叫多個反覆項目可能會方法。It is possible for multiple iterations of a parallel loop to call the method. 如果沒有的話，這個值會是反覆項目呼叫的最小索引。If they do, this value is the smallest index of an iteration that called . 如果迴圈的任何反覆項目不呼叫，這個屬性會傳回`null`。If no iteration of the loop called , this property returns `null`. 請注意，屬性值不會受到呼叫方法。Note that the property value is unaffected by calls to the method. 在呼叫的反覆項目之後的所有反覆項目中的長時間執行反覆項目方法不需要再執行，屬性用來終止反覆項目，開始執行之前呼叫方法。In long-running iterations in which all iterations after the iteration that calls the method need not run, the property is used to terminate iterations that began execution before the call to the method. 若要停止其索引大於最低中斷反覆項目，從競爭執行的反覆項目，您應該執行下列作業：To stop iterations whose index is greater than the lowest break iteration from competing execution, you should do the following: 1. 檢查是否屬性是`true`。Check whether the property is `true`. 2. 結束反覆項目是否大於其索引屬性值。Exit from the iteration if its index is greater than the property value. 這個範例將提供說明。The example provides an illustration. ## Examples 下列範例會以平行方式執行迴圈的最多 100 個反覆項目。The following example executes up to 100 iterations of a loop in parallel. 從 1 到 1000 毫秒之間的隨機間隔就會暫停每個反覆項目。Each iteration pauses for a random interval from 1 to 1,000 milliseconds. 隨機產生的值會決定迴圈的反覆項目上呼叫方法。A randomly generated value determines on which iteration of the loop the method is called. 這可防止反覆項目其索引大於屬性值從呼叫之後開始方法，但它並不會影響已經開始執行任何反覆項目。This prevents iterations whose index is greater than the property value from starting after the call to the method, but it does not affect any iterations that have already begun executing. 若要避免這些無法完成，每個反覆項目會呼叫方法來檢查是否已呼叫另一個反覆項目方法。To prevent these from completing, each iteration calls the method to check whether another iteration has called the method. 因此，在反覆項目會檢查的值如果屬性以及其是否大於目前的反覆項目的索引值，會立即傳回。If so, the iteration checks the value of the property and, if it is greater than the current iteration's index value, returns immediately. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/cs/break1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/vb/break1.vb#2)] 請注意，因為值超出範圍，平行迴圈外，您必須將它指派給變數，會顯示在迴圈外，如果您想要保留其值。Note that, because the value is out of scope outside of the parallel loop, you must assign it to a variable that is visible outside of the loop if you want to preserve its value.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ShouldExitCurrentIteration As Boolean
public: property bool ShouldExitCurrentIteration { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得是否應該根據迴圈中目前這個或其他反覆項目的要求，來結束目前這個反覆項目。

span.span: Gets whether the current iteration of the loop should exit based on requests made by this or other iterations.

value.span: 如果目前的反覆項目應該結束，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current iteration should exit; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性設定為`true`任何下列的情況下：The property is set to `true` under any of the following conditions: - 迴圈呼叫的反覆項目或。An iteration of the loop calls or . - 迴圈的反覆項目會擲回例外狀況。An iteration of the loop throws an exception. - 迴圈會取消。The loop is canceled. 當這個屬性是`true`，則類別會主動嘗試開始執行時，禁止迴圈的其他反覆項目。When this property is `true`, the class will proactively attempt to prohibit additional iterations of the loop from starting execution. 不過，可能會無法避免啟動其他反覆項目時的情況。However, there may be cases where it is unable to prevent additional iterations from starting. 它也可能是長時間執行的反覆項目已開始執行的情況。It may also be the case that a long-running iteration has already begun execution. 在此情況下，反覆項目可能會明確檢查屬性，並終止執行，如果屬性傳回`true`。In such cases, iterations may explicitly check the property and cease execution if the property returns `true`. ## Examples 下列範例會以平行方式執行迴圈的最多 100 個反覆項目。The following example executes up to 100 iterations of a loop in parallel. 從 1 到 1000 毫秒之間的隨機間隔就會暫停每個反覆項目。Each iteration pauses for a random interval from 1 to 1,000 milliseconds. 隨機產生的值會決定迴圈的反覆項目上呼叫方法。A randomly generated value determines on which iteration of the loop the method is called. 這可防止反覆項目其索引大於屬性值從呼叫之後開始方法，但它並不會影響已經開始執行任何反覆項目。This prevents iterations whose index is greater than the property value from starting after the call to the method, but it does not affect any iterations that have already begun executing. 若要避免這些無法完成，每個反覆項目會呼叫方法來檢查是否已呼叫另一個反覆項目方法。To prevent these from completing, each iteration calls the method to check whether another iteration has called the method. 因此，在反覆項目會檢查的值如果屬性以及其是否大於目前的反覆項目的索引值，會立即傳回。If so, the iteration checks the value of the property and, if it is greater than the current iteration's index value, returns immediately. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/cs/break1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/vb/break1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Stop() cil managed

summary.span: 傳達 迴圈應該依系統的方便盡早停止執行。

span.span: Communicates that the loop should cease execution at the system's earliest convenience.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法表示不需要執行任何反覆項目迴圈的尚未開始。Calling the method indicates that any iterations of the loop that have not yet started need not be run. 實際上，它就會取消迴圈中的任何其他反覆項目。It effectively cancels any additional iterations of the loop. 不過，它不會停止已經開始執行任何反覆項目。However, it does not stop any iterations that have already begun execution. 呼叫方法會使屬性，以傳回`true`仍在執行迴圈的任何反覆項目。Calling the method causes the property to return `true` for any iteration of the loop that is still executing. 這特別適合用於長時間執行反覆項目，可以檢查屬性並結束早期如果其值為`true`。This is particularly useful for long-running iterations, which can check the property and exit early if its value is `true`. 通常會採用以搜尋為基礎的演算法，其中結果之後找到，沒有其他反覆項目需要執行。 is typically employed in search-based algorithms, where once a result is found, no other iterations need be executed. ## Examples 下列範例會以平行方式執行迴圈的最多 10,000 個反覆項目。The following example executes up to 10,000 iterations of a loop in parallel. 從 1 到 1000 毫秒之間的隨機間隔就會暫停每個反覆項目。Each iteration pauses for a random interval from 1 to 1,000 milliseconds. 隨機產生的值會決定迴圈的反覆項目上呼叫方法。A randomly generated value determines on which iteration of the loop the method is called. 如範例輸出所示，任何反覆項目執行之後呼叫方法。As the output from the example shows, no iterations execute after the call to the method. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/cs/stop1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/vb/stop1.vb#1)] 因為迴圈的反覆項目仍可能同時執行的時機呼叫方法，每個反覆項目會呼叫方法來檢查是否已呼叫另一個反覆項目方法。Because iterations of the loop are still likely to be executing when the method is called, each iteration calls the method to check whether another iteration has called the method. 如果它傳回`true`，反覆項目會立即傳回。If it returns `true`, the iteration returns immediately.

span.span: The method was called previously.

exception.span: 和 可能無法由相同迴圈的反覆項目搭配使用。

span.span: and may not be used in combination by iterations of the same loop.
